featured.text: In the keen competition of this international tennis tournament, she ________ won the championship.
He has won the running championship _____ for three years.

definition.zh_def: 冠軍賽，通常指體育或競賽中的最高榮譽或比賽。
definition.en_def: A contest for the position of champion in a sport or other competitive event.
definition.example: The team worked hard all season to win the championship.
